reuters.title: AVAQ INTERNATIONAL TO SEEK COMMITMENT ON DEAL
reuters.body: <AVAQ International Inc> said it intends to require Gates Learjet Corp <GLJ> to honor its agreement to sell its shares to the company. AVAQ said it made the statement in response to an offer by <Interconnect Capital Corp> for all of Gates Learjet shares after what it believed to be an agreement by Gates to accept its offer. AVAQ said it offered, pusuant to Gates' guidelines, six dlrs per share, plus the purchase of Gates Corp's promisary note for 23 mln dlrs. Interconnect said it offered 7.07 dlrs per share, plus the repurchase of the loan for 13 mlns, for an aggregate price in the 95 mln dlr range. Interconnect said it made the offer to the board of directors of Gates Learjet on March 9. AVAQ said Gates Corp and Gates Learjet approved its offer Feb 26. Reuter 
